title: spec: clarify range over nil values
body:
This has now come up at least three times:

http://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts/browse_thread/thread/d9354cdd183cc3fc

"The length of nil slice, map, and channel are 0. 
What's the expected behaviour of loop when the range expression 
evaluates to nil? 
"

Rob: "I'm not certain this is well specified.  That should be addressed."
